form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Welch (for himself, Mr. Hoeven, and Ms. Smith) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

form.official-title: To require the Secretary of Agriculture to establish a pilot program to implement a pre-qualification or pre-approval process for farmers and ranchers with respect to a direct farm ownership loan under the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Farm Ownership Improvement Act.

section.header: Direct farm ownership loan pilot program
section.text: Subtitle D of the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act is amended by inserting after section 374 (7 U.S.C. 2008i) the following:

section.header: Direct farm ownership loan pilot program

subsection.text: Not later than 2 years after the date of enactment of the Farm Ownership Improvement Act, the Secretary shall establish a 5-year pilot program (referred to in this section as the pilot program) to implement a pre-qualification or pre-approval process for farmers and ranchers with respect to a direct farm ownership loan under subtitle A.

In carrying out section 360(b) with respect to a participant in the pilot program, the Secretary, as the Secretary determines to be appropriate, may make use of alternative methods, including financial benchmarking, to reliably evaluate the financial viability of the participant and the likelihood of repayment of the applicable loan.
This section shall not be interpreted to repeal any borrowing requirement imposed under subtitle A.
In conducting outreach relating to the pilot program, the Secretary shall prioritize outreach to organizations that have demonstrated engagement with beginning farmers or ranchers.

paragraph.text: evaluate the pilot program on an ongoing basis; and
annually submit to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry of the Senate and the Committee on Agriculture of the House of Representatives a written report that includes—

subparagraph.text: a description of the performance outcomes of the pilot program, including stakeholder and participant evaluations, assessments, and participation demographics, that includes the information described in section 5413(b)(1)(A)(iv) of the Agriculture Improvement Act of 2018 (7 U.S.C. 2008x(b)(1)(A)(iv)); and
a recommendation as to the value of the pilot program, including whether to authorize a permanent program modeled on the pilot program.
